column4: Why is it that some apps (such as putty) have such a weird, annoying font? and is there any way of changing it?
putty's font would depend on what you picked for it, it's in the configs I believe.  Btu that'd be local on your windows box, linux has nothing to do with that
Nah, there's this font that shows up on a bunch of apps, such as putty; windows isn't entering into the equation here
putty wouldn't have anything to do with linux at all.  It's entirely local
